markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Repurposed Parts](/Feats.aspx?ID=3138) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 54</row>

**Archetype** [Trapsmith](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=111)

**Prerequisites**
[Trapsmith Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3134)

</column>

---

You are familiar with the fittings and cogwheels of your [snares](/equipment/snares) and can repurpose parts from prepared quick-deploy snares to assemble a new creation on the fly. Using two of the snares you prepared for quick deployment during daily preparations, you can quickly deploy a different snare that you know how to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43), even if you didn't prepare that snare during your daily preparations.
name: Repurposed Parts
